scripts.postinstall: lerna clean --yes && lerna exec -- yarn --pure-lockfile --no-progress --mutex network
scripts.build-icons: lerna exec --scope=@talend/icons -- yarn run prepublish && lerna exec --scope=@talend/react-components -- yarn test -- -u
scripts.build-storybook: npm run test:demo && export ACTION='test:demo' && export TRAVIS_BRANCH='master' && export TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR=`pwd` && .travis/after_success_static.sh && .travis/after_success_demo.sh && .travis/after_success_coverage.sh
scripts.extract-i18n: npm run extract-i18n-components && npm run extract-i18n-forms && npm run extract-i18n-containers
scripts.extract-i18n-components: i18next packages/components/src -r --default-values -o i18n/components -n tui-components -l en --write-old false --fileFilter '*.js' --directoryFilter '!__snapshots__'
scripts.extract-i18n-forms: i18next packages/forms/src -r --default-values -o i18n/forms -n tui-forms -l en --write-old false --fileFilter '*.js' --directoryFilter '!__snapshots__'
scripts.extract-i18n-containers: i18next packages/containers/src -r --default-values -o i18n/containers -n tui-containers -l en --write-old false --fileFilter '*.js' --directoryFilter '!__snapshots__'
scripts.lint:jso: npm run lint:1 && npm run lint:2 && npm run lint:3 && npm run lint:4 && npm run lint:5 && npm run lint:6 &&  npm run lint:7 && npm run lint:8
scripts.lint:1: (lerna exec --scope=@talend/react-sagas -- npm run lint:es | awk '{if(NR>2)print}') 1> output/sagas.eslint.txt
scripts.lint:2: (lerna exec --scope=@talend/react-datagrid -- npm run lint:es | awk '{if(NR>2)print}') 1> output/datagrid.eslint.txt
scripts.lint:3: (lerna exec --scope=@talend/react-cmf -- npm run lint:es | awk '{if(NR>2)print}') 1> output/cmf.eslint.txt 2>/dev/null
scripts.lint:4: (lerna exec --scope=@talend/react-cmf-webpack-plugin -- npm run lint:es | awk '{if(NR>2)print}') 1> output/cmf-webpack-plugin.eslint.txt 2>/dev/null
scripts.lint:5: (lerna exec --scope=@talend/react-components -- npm run lint:es | awk '{if(NR>2)print}') 1> output/components.eslint.txt
scripts.lint:6: (lerna exec --scope=@talend/react-containers -- npm run lint:es | awk '{if(NR>2)print}') 1> output/containers.eslint.txt 2>/dev/null
scripts.lint:7: (lerna exec --scope=@talend/react-forms -- npm run lint:es | awk '{if(NR>2)print}') 1> output/forms.eslint.txt 2>/dev/null
scripts.lint:8: (lerna exec --scope=@talend/log -- npm run lint:es | awk '{if(NR>2)print}') 1> output/logging.eslint.txt 2>/dev/null
